Posts.Content: D-Ann123 wrote: I am new to this forum,  I had my first kemo treatment on Friday May 7th.  All of a sudden I am feeling a tingly burning sensation in my scalp.   I was wondering if this normal.  Does this mean my hair will soon fall out? Dx 3/1/2010, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IIIC, 14/17 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: when does your hair fall out with kemo D-Ann123 pupfoster1

Posts.Content: May 19, 2010 07:35PM D-Ann123 wrote: Hi Sharon, Thank you for your response.  I am on A/c  followed by T.  Then rads.  My oncologist told me around day 14.  Which actually is the day of my next kemo. (this Friday)  God help me.  I am on whats called dose dense which is every other week.  The day after the kemo my husband gives me a shot of nuelasta.  I am very anxious over the whole hair falling out.  I have my wig picked out.  I also get anxious prior to the kemo treatment.  Thank you so very much for all your help
